p: Following incubation phase, maize samples were crushed into fine powder under sterile condition and 1 g was subjected to serial dilution and plated on Sabouraud dextrose agar Petri plates. The fungal growth was determined in log CFU/g. Another, 10 g of fine powder was suspended in acetonitrile (HiMedia, Mumbai, India) and used for immunoaffinity clean-up of OTA as per instructions of manufacturer (Vicam, USA).
